$interpreted: Valdrir: Guh... Ouch...
Rune: I can't, stand up.
Valdrir: Wait! I'll help you.
Valdrir: Are you okay? Are you hurt?
Rune: ...Don't think so. Moving, not good. Rune wants, untie rope.
Valdrir: ......
Valdrir: ...We should go. We've got places to be.
Rune: Rune, not want go. Rune wants, back to Sophie.
Valdrir: Come with me. Or do you want to be punished?
Valdrir: (Is he angry? What should I do, was I too harsh? Or has he realized that there's little I can do all by myself...)
Rune: ...Your face is angry. Eyes crying.
Valdrir: What...
Rune: ...I, go with you.
Valdrir: Oh... Why...
Rune: Let's go.
Valdrir: ......
Valdrir: ...Okay.
Rune: Where, is this?
Valdrir: The Third Ancient Crevasse. The exit is right up ahead. When Eida and I were little...
Valdrir: I'd say to her, Only I know the way, if you don't follow and just run about—
Rune: Are you, taking me, to the volcano? Eidatyr said, you me both die.
Valdrir: ...Yes.
Valdrir: ...It's my duty as clan mother.
Rune: ...Rune, not understand. Wait Eidatyr come back, also duty?
Valdrir: ......
Valdrir: ...No. I waited, but I didn't believe she'd ever return... It was my choice.
Rune: ...Duty, choice, which more important?
Valdrir: They're the same for me... My duty is my choice. I want—to protect my people.
Valdrir: Even if you and Eida were hurt... You wouldn't understand...
Rune: ...I, understand.
Rune: Rune wants, protect Sophie, protect Circus, too. Understand.
Valdrir: You...
Rune: Me, stupid. Protecting Sophie, but make Sophie cry. Valdrir, stupid like me, too.
Valdrir: ......
Valdrir: ...Yes, I've been stupid. But you're gentle, too, Rune.
Rune: I, don't understand...?
Valdrir: ...I mean that we're quite alike.
Clan Villager: Here! Its the clan mother!
Gretta: We've finally found you, Valdrir. This is wonderful.
Valdrir: Grand Sorcerer...! How did you...
Gretta: We couldn't find you anywhere we looked, so our only option left was to try at one of the exits to the ice tunnels.
Gretta: We didn't dare to go far, in case we got lost. Just when we were about to turn back, we happened across your path.
Valdrir: I'm sorry, everyone must have been so worried. This all happened because I broke the clan's rules. I'll have to punish myself...
Gretta: Don't worry, child. All that matters is that your safe.
Valdrir: Grand Sorcerer Gretta... The Lysfete...
Gretta: ...It wasn't successful.
Valdrir: I knew it...! Grand Sorcerer, we have to offer a sacrifice. It's the only way!
Gretta: Valdrir... Once the offering is made, there'll be no turning back.
Valdrir: I know you pity me... but this is my destiny. And—
Valdrir: (I'm sorry...)
Valdrir: ...It's what the Goddess would want, too. Only then will my lost brother come back to us.
Gretta: (...I sent that child away with my very own hands...)
Gretta: I understand. Since you have made up my mind, I will do my best.
Valdrir: ...Thank you.
Gretta: ...Once the ritual is begun, it cannot be stopped. I'll need to focus all of my concentration, without distraction...
Valdrir: I understand.
Gretta: ...May the aurora light the way for you, your brother, and for all the north.
Sharp Clan Villager: It's the curse of Vendacti!
Brave Clan Villager: Do not distract the Grand Sorcerer! Keep her and the clan mother safe!
Valdrir: (If we don't do something, we'll all be swallowed up by the curse... What should I do...)
Valdrir: (Oh, Rune...)
Valdrir: (...But... Once he's released...)
Brave Clan Villager: Gwagh!
Valdrir: I know I acted despicably, and Eida too...! But... Please, help me, help me to save us all!
Rune: Hmm!
Rune: What's that, that light?
Valdrir: ...It's beginning... Rune, you have to...
Valdrir: ......
Sophie: Rune...!
Rune: Sophie's voice...?
Valdrir: I have to save the clan...
Valdrir: I can't stop you, Rune... I don't have the right, either, so...
Valdrir: Please, live well, take care of yourself... Brother.
Naya: Guh... urgh...
Angelia: Naya!
Hyde: If you really wish to save yourself, you'll work together with the Dracontines. It's simple, all you have to do—is nod your head.
Angelia: Oh... Dylan and Ace'll be back any moment now...
Angelia: Any moment...

Model.Text: Guh... Ouch...
I can't, stand up.
Wait! I'll help you.
Are you okay? Are you hurt?
...Don't think so. Moving, not good. Rune wants, untie rope.
...We should go. We've got places to be.
Rune, not want go. Rune wants, back to Sophie.
Come with me. Or do you want to be punished?
(Is he angry? What should I do, was I too harsh? Or has he realized that there's little I can do all by myself...)
...Your face is angry. Eyes crying.
What...
...I, go with you.
Oh... Why...
Let's go.
...Okay.
Where, is this?
The Third Ancient Crevasse. The exit is right up ahead. When Eida and I were little...
I'd say to her, Only I know the way, if you don't follow and just run about—
Are you, taking me, to the volcano? Eidatyr said, you me both die.
...Yes.
...It's my duty as clan mother.
...Rune, not understand. Wait Eidatyr come back, also duty?
...No. I waited, but I didn't believe she'd ever return... It was my choice.
...Duty, choice, which more important?
They're the same for me... My duty is my choice. I want—to protect my people.
Even if you and Eida were hurt... You wouldn't understand...
...I, understand.
Rune wants, protect Sophie, protect Circus, too. Understand.
You...

...Yes, I've been stupid. But you're gentle, too, Rune.

...I mean that we're quite alike.
Here! Its the clan mother!

Don't worry, child. All that matters is that your safe.
Grand Sorcerer Gretta... The Lysfete...
...It wasn't successful.
I knew it...! Grand Sorcerer, we have to offer a sacrifice. It's the only way!
Valdrir... Once the offering is made, there'll be no turning back.
I know you pity me... but this is my destiny. And—
(I'm sorry...)
...It's what the Goddess would want, too. Only then will my lost brother come back to us.
(...I sent that child away with my very own hands...)
I understand. Since you have made up my mind, I will do my best.
...Thank you.
...Once the ritual is begun, it cannot be stopped. I'll need to focus all of my concentration, without distraction...
I understand.
...May the aurora light the way for you, your brother, and for all the north.
It's the curse of Vendacti!
Do not distract the Grand Sorcerer! Keep her and the clan mother safe!
(If we don't do something, we'll all be swallowed up by the curse... What should I do...)
(Oh, Rune...)
(...But... Once he's released...)
Gwagh!
I know I acted despicably, and Eida too...! But... Please, help me, help me to save us all!
Hmm!
What's that, that light?
...It's beginning... Rune, you have to...
Rune...!
Sophie's voice...?
I have to save the clan...
I can't stop you, Rune... I don't have the right, either, so...
Please, live well, take care of yourself... Brother.
Guh... urgh...
Naya!
If you really wish to save yourself, you'll work together with the Dracontines. It's simple, all you have to do—is nod your head.
Oh... Dylan and Ace'll be back any moment now...
Any moment...
